categories: Category:Jedi Masters of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Shian was a Jedi Master who served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic as a combat instructor, during the Galactic War with the Sith Empire. A Human male with blue eyes and dark skin who wore gray and white robes, Shian carried a single lightsaber. He was stationed in the Command Center of the Republic Military's Farnel Outpost on the planet Balmorra.
A class trainer for the Jedi Knight class on Balmorra, Shian first appeared in the BioWare–LucasArts video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, which was released in 2011.
